```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
using JuliaPackageTemplate
```

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
export_names = filter(!=(:JuliaPackageTemplate), names(JuliaPackageTemplate))

println("""
<button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary mb-3" onclick="
  var callouts = document.querySelectorAll('.callout.callout-note');
  var allOpen = Array.from(callouts).every(function(c) { return !c.classList.contains('callout-collapse') || c.querySelector('.callout-collapse .collapse.show'); });
  callouts.forEach(function(c) {
    var collapse = c.querySelector('.callout-collapse .collapse');
    if (!collapse) return;
    var bsCollapse = bootstrap.Collapse.getOrCreateInstance(collapse, {toggle: false});
    allOpen ? bsCollapse.hide() : bsCollapse.show();
  });
  this.textContent = allOpen ? 'Expand All' : 'Collapse All';
">Expand All</button>
""")

# Table of contents
for name in export_names
    binding = getfield(JuliaPackageTemplate, name)
    kind = binding isa Type ? "type" : binding isa Function ? "function" : "constant"
    println("- [`$name`](#$(lowercase(string(name)))) *($(kind))*")
end
println()

# Detailed sections
for name in export_names
    binding = getfield(JuliaPackageTemplate, name)
    kind = binding isa Type ? "type" : binding isa Function ? "function" : "constant"
    doc = string(Docs.doc(binding))
    println("""
    ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
    ## `$name` [*($(kind))*]{.text-muted}

    $doc
    :::
    """)
end
```
